833:4: vande bhaktyā praṇamitaśirasā nirvṛtā yena buddhāḥ|| 1||
833:6: śrāvastyāṃ lumbikāyāṃ kuśinagaravare kāpilākhye ca sthāne|
833:8: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalabalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān|| 2||
833:9: kailāśe hemakūṭe himavati nilaye mandare merūśṛṅge
833:12: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalavalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān|| 3||
833:13: kāśmīre cīnadeśe khasatavarapure balkale siṃhale vā
833:16: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalavalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān|| 4||
833:17: ye ca syurdhātugarbhā daśabalatanujāḥ kumbhasaṃjñāśca caityāḥ
833:19: pātāle ye ca bhūmyāṃ giriśikharagatā ye ca vittāḥ samantād
833:20: buddhānāṃ ye ca vimbāḥ pratidinasukṛtastān namasyāmi buddhān|| 5||
